00037 #include "egs_run_control.h"
00038 #include "egs_application.h"

00048 vector<EGS_Library *> rc_libs;
00049 static int n_run_controls = 0;
00050 
00051 EGS_RunControl::EGS_RunControl(EGS_Application *a) : app(a), input(0),
00052     ncase(0), ndone(0), nbatch(10), maxt(-1), accu(-1), restart(0), nchunk(1),
00053     cpu_time(0), previous_cpu_time(0), geomErrorCount(0), geomErrorMax(0) {
00054     n_run_controls++;
00055     if( !app ) egsFatal("EGS_RunControl::EGS_RunControl: it is not allowed\n"
00056           " to construct a run control object on a NULL application\n");
00057     input = app->getInput();
00058     if( !input ) {
00059         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::EGS_RunControl: the application has no"
00060                 " input\n"); return;
00061     }
00062     input = input->takeInputItem("run control");
00063     if( !input ) {
00064         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::EGS_RunControl: no 'run control' "
00065                 "input\n"); return;
00066     }
00067     double ncase_double;
00068     int err = input->getInput("number of histories", ncase_double);
00069     if( err ) {
00070         err = input->getInput("ncase", ncase_double);
00071         if( err )
00072             egsWarning("EGS_RunControl: missing/wrong 'ncase' or "
00073                  "'number of histories' input\n");
00074     }
00075     ncase = EGS_I64(ncase_double);
00076     err = input->getInput("nbatch",nbatch);
00077     if( err ) nbatch = 10;
00078     err = input->getInput("max cpu hours allowed",maxt);
00079     if( err ) maxt = -1;
00080     err = input->getInput("statistical accuracy sought",accu);
00081     if( err ) accu = -1;
00082     err = input->getInput("geometry error limit", geomErrorMax);
00083     if( err ) geomErrorMax = 0;
00084     vector<string> ctype;
00085     ctype.push_back("first"); ctype.push_back("restart");
00086     ctype.push_back("analyze"); ctype.push_back("combine");
00087     restart = input->getInput("calculation",ctype,0);
00088 }
00089 
00090 EGS_RunControl::~EGS_RunControl() {
00091     if( input ) delete input;
00092     n_run_controls--;
00093     if( !n_run_controls ) {
00094         while( rc_libs.size() > 0 ) {
00095             delete rc_libs[rc_libs.size()-1]; rc_libs.pop_back();
00096         }
00097     }
00098 }

00100 bool EGS_RunControl::storeState(ostream &data) {
00101     if( !egsStoreI64(data,ndone) ) return false;
00102     data << "  " << (cpu_time+previous_cpu_time) << endl;
00103     return data.good();
00104 }
00105 
00106 bool EGS_RunControl::setState(istream &data) {
00107     EGS_I64 ndone1;
00108     if( !egsGetI64(data,ndone1) ) return false;
00109     ndone += ndone1; ncase += ndone1;
00110     data >> previous_cpu_time;
00111     return data.good();
00112 }
00113 
00114 bool EGS_RunControl::addState(istream &data) {
00115     EGS_Float previous_cpu_time_save = previous_cpu_time;
00116     if( !setState(data) ) return false;
00117     previous_cpu_time += previous_cpu_time_save;
00118     return true;
00119 }
00120 
00121 void EGS_RunControl::resetCounter() {
00122     previous_cpu_time = 0; cpu_time = 0; timer.start();
00123     ncase = 0; ndone = 0;
00124 }
00125 
00126 int EGS_RunControl::startSimulation() {
00127     if( restart == 1 || restart == 2 ) {
00128         if( app->readData() ) return -1;
00129         if( restart == 2 ) {
00130             ncase = ndone;
00131             egsInformation("\n\nResult analysis only\n\n");
00132             return 1;
00133         }
00134     }
00135     else if( restart == 3 ) {
00136         app->describeSimulation();
00137         egsInformation("\n\nCombine results only\n\n");
00138         egsInformation("calling combineResults()\n");
00139         int err = app->combineResults();
00140         ncase = ndone;
00141         return err ? -1 : 2;
00142     }
00143     app->describeSimulation();
00144     time_t tinfo = time(0);
00145     egsInformation("\n\nStarting simulation on %s\n",
00146             asctime(localtime(&tinfo)));
00147     if( restart == 0 )
00148         egsInformation("    Fresh simulation of %lld histories\n\n\n",ncase);
00149     else {
00150         egsInformation("    Restarted simulation with %lld old and %lld"
00151             " new histories\n\n\n",ndone,ncase-ndone);
00152     }
00153     timer.start();
00154     return 0;
00155 }
00156 
00157 bool EGS_RunControl::startBatch(int ibatch, EGS_I64 ncase_per_batch) {
00158     if( !ibatch ) egsInformation(
00159 "  Batch             CPU time        Result   Uncertainty(%c)\n"
00160 "==========================================================\n",'%');
00161     if( maxt > 0 && ndone > 0 ) {
00162         EGS_Float time_per_shower = (cpu_time + previous_cpu_time)/ndone;
00163         EGS_Float extra_time = time_per_shower*ncase_per_batch;
00164         if( cpu_time + extra_time > maxt*3600 ) {
00165             egsWarning("\n\n*** Not enough time to finish another batch\n"
00166                            "    => terminating simulation.\n\n");
00167             return false;
00168         }
00169     }
00170     egsInformation("%7d",ibatch+1);
00171     ndone += ncase_per_batch;
00172     return true;
00173 }
00174 
00175 bool EGS_RunControl::finishBatch() {
00176     cpu_time = timer.time();
00177     int out = app->outputData();
00178     if( out ) egsWarning("\n\noutputData() returned error code %d ?\n",out);
00179     double sum, sum2, norm, count;
00180     app->getCurrentResult(sum,sum2,norm,count);
00181     double f, df;
00182     if( sum > 0 && sum2 > 0 && norm > 0 && count > 1 ) {
00183         f = sum*norm/count;
00184         df = count*sum2/(sum*sum)-1;
00185         if( df > 0 ) df = 100*sqrt(df/(count-1)); else df = 100;
00186     } else { f = 0; df = 100; }
00187     egsInformation("        %12.2f %14g %14.2f\n",cpu_time,f,df);
00188     if( df < 100 && accu > 0 && df < accu ) {
00189         char c = '%';
00190         egsWarning("\n\n*** Reached the requested uncertainty of %g%c\n"
00191                        "    => terminating simulation.\n\n",accu,c);
00192         return false;
00193     }
00194     return true;
00195 }

00206 #define OPEN_FILE _open
00207 #define CLOSE_FILE _close
00208 #define CREATE_FLAGS _O_CREAT | _O_EXCL | _O_RDWR, _S_IREAD | _S_IWRITE
00209 #define OPEN_FLAGS _O_RDWR,_S_IREAD | _S_IWRITE
00210 #define WAIT_FOR_FILE _sleep(1000)
00211 #define WRITE_FILE _write
00212 #define READ_FILE _read
00213 
00214 #else
00215 
00216 #include <unistd.h>
00217 #include <fcntl.h>
00218 #include <sys/types.h>
00219 #include <sys/stat.h>
00220 #include <errno.h>
00221 #include <string.h>
00222 #include <stdio.h>
00223 
00224 #define OPEN_FILE open
00225 #define CLOSE_FILE close
00226 #define CREATE_FLAGS O_RDWR | O_CREAT | O_EXCL, S_IRUSR | S_IWUSR
00227 #define OPEN_FLAGS O_RDWR
00228 #define WAIT_FOR_FILE sleep(1)
00229 #define WRITE_FILE write
00230 #define READ_FILE read
00231 
00232 #endif
00233 
00234 #ifndef SKIP_DOXYGEN
00235 
00240 class EGS_LOCAL EGS_FileLocking {
00241 public:
00242     int  fd;
00243     bool is_locked;
00244     int  ntry;
00245 #ifndef WIN32
00246     struct flock fl_write, fl_unlock;
00247 #endif
00248     EGS_FileLocking() : fd(-1), is_locked(false), ntry(15) {
00249 #ifndef WIN32
00250         fl_write.l_type = F_WRLCK; fl_write.l_whence = SEEK_SET;
00251         fl_write.l_start = 0; fl_write.l_len = 0;
00252         fl_unlock.l_type = F_UNLCK; fl_unlock.l_whence = SEEK_SET;
00253         fl_unlock.l_start = 0; fl_unlock.l_len = 0;
00254 #endif
00255     };
00256     ~EGS_FileLocking() { if( fd > 0 ) CLOSE_FILE(fd); };
00257     bool createControlFile(const char *fname) {
00258         is_locked = false;
00259         if( fd > 0 ) CLOSE_FILE(fd);
00260         fd = OPEN_FILE(fname,CREATE_FLAGS);
00261         egsWarning("createControlFile: file=%s fd=%d\n",fname,fd);
00262         if( fd < 0 ) {
00263             egsWarning("createControlFile(): open failed! (fd=%d)\n",fd);
00264 #ifndef WIN32
00265             perror("System error was");
00266 #endif
00267         }
00268         return lockControlFile();
00269     };
00270     bool openControlFile(const char *fname) {
00271         is_locked = false;
00272         if( fd > 0 ) CLOSE_FILE(fd);
00273         for(int t=0; t<ntry; t++) {
00274             fd = OPEN_FILE(fname,OPEN_FLAGS); if( fd > 0 ) break;
00275             WAIT_FOR_FILE;
00276         }
00277         return ( fd > 0 );
00278     };
00279     bool closeControlFile() {
00280         if( fd > 0 ) {
00281             int res = CLOSE_FILE(fd); fd = -1; return !res;
00282         }
00283         return true;
00284     };
00285     bool lockControlFile() {
00286         if( is_locked ) return true;
00287         if( fd < 0 ) return false;
00288 #ifdef WIN32
00289         long np = _lseek(fd,0L,SEEK_SET);
00290         if( np ) {
00291             egsWarning("lockControlFile: _lseek returned %d?\n",np);
00292             return false;
00293         }
00294         int res = _locking(fd,_LK_LOCK,1000000L);
00295         if( !res ) { is_locked = true; return true; }
00296         return false;
00297 #else
00298         for(int i1=0; i1<5; i1++) {
00299             for(int i2=0; i2<12; i2++) {
00300                 int res = fcntl(fd,F_SETLK,&fl_write);
00301                 if( !res ) { is_locked = true; return true; }
00302                 WAIT_FOR_FILE ;
00303             }
00304             egsWarning("lockControlFile: failed to lock file for "
00305                     "12 seconds...\n");
00306         }
00307         return false;
00308 #endif
00309     };
00310     bool unlockControlFile() {
00311         if( !is_locked ) return true;
00312         if( fd < 0 ) return false;
00313 #ifdef WIN32
00314         int np = _lseek(fd,0L,SEEK_SET);
00315         if( np ) {
00316             egsWarning("unlockControlFile: _lseek returned %d?\n",np);
00317             return false;
00318         }
00319         int res = _locking(fd,_LK_UNLCK,1000000L);
00320 #else
00321         int res = fcntl(fd,F_SETLKW,&fl_unlock);
00322 #endif
00323         if( !res ) { is_locked = false; return true; }
00324         return false;
00325     };
00326     bool rewindControlFile() {
00327         if( fd < 0 ) return false;
00328         if( !is_locked ) {
00329             if( !lockControlFile() ) return false;
00330         }
00331 #ifdef WIN32
00332         return !_lseek(fd,0,SEEK_SET);
00333 #else
00334         return !lseek(fd,0,SEEK_SET);
00335 #endif
00336     };
00337 };
00338 
00339 #endif
00340 
00341 EGS_JCFControl::EGS_JCFControl(EGS_Application *a, int Nbuf) :
00342     EGS_RunControl(a), p(new EGS_FileLocking),
00343     npar(app->getNparallel()), ipar(app->getIparallel()),
00344     first_time(true), nbuf(Nbuf), njob(0), tsum(0), tsum2(0), tcount(0),
00345     norm(1), last_sum(0), last_sum2(0), last_count(0), removed_jcf(false) {
00346     if( input ) {
00347         int err = input->getInput("nchunk",nchunk);
00348         if( err ) nchunk = 10;
00349     } else nchunk = 10;
00350     if( nbuf < 0 ) nbuf = 1024; buf = new char [nbuf];
00351     nleft = ncase; ntot = 0;
00352     //egsInformation("EGS_JCFControl::EGS_JCFControl:\n");
00353     //egsInformation("  ncase = %lld nleft = %lld nchunk = %d\n",
00354     //        nleft,ncase,nchunk);
00355 }
00356 
00357 bool EGS_JCFControl::createControlFile() {
00358     string cfile = egsJoinPath(app->getAppDir(),app->getFinalOutputFile());
00359     cfile += ".lock";
00360     if( !p->createControlFile(cfile.c_str()) ) {
00361         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to create or lock the "
00362                 " job control file %s\n\n",cfile.c_str());
00363         return false;
00364     }
00365     if( p->fd < 0 ) return false;
00366     writeControlString();
00367     int nwant = strlen(buf)+1;
00368     int nwrite = WRITE_FILE(p->fd,buf,nwant);
00369     if( nwrite != nwant ) return false;
00370     return p->unlockControlFile();
00371 }
00372 
00373 bool EGS_JCFControl::openControlFile() {
00374     string cfile = egsJoinPath(app->getAppDir(),app->getFinalOutputFile());
00375     cfile += ".lock";
00376     if( !p->openControlFile(cfile.c_str()) ) {
00377         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to open the "
00378                 " job control file %s\n\n",cfile.c_str());
00379         return false;
00380     }
00381     return true;
00382 }

00391 #define MY_ISTREAM std::istringstream

00394 bool EGS_JCFControl::writeControlString() {
00395     //if( first_time ) { start_time = time(0); first_time = false; }
00396     if( first_time ) start_time = time(0);
00397     /*
00398     MY_OSTREAM data(buf);
00399     //ostream &data = cout;
00400     if( !egsStoreI64(data,ntot) ) return false;
00401     if( !egsStoreI64(data,nleft) ) return false;
00402     data << " " << njob << " " << tsum << " " << tsum2 << " " << tcount << " ";
00403     double f = tsum*norm, df;
00404     if( tsum > 0 && tsum2 > 0 && norm > 0 && tcount > 1 ) {
00405         df = tcount*tsum2/(tsum*tsum)-1;
00406         if( df > 0 ) df = 100*sqrt(df/(tcount-1)); else df = 100;
00407     } else df = 100;
00408     data << f << " " << df << " " << start_time << endl;
00409     if( f > 0 && df < 100 ) egsInformation("\nCombined result from all "
00410           "parallel jobs: %g +/- %g%%\n\n",f,df);
00411     egsInformation("EGS_JCFControl::writeControlString: <%s>\n",buf);
00412     return data.good();
00413     */
00414     double f = tsum*norm, df;
00415     if( tsum > 0 && tsum2 > 0 && norm > 0 && tcount > 1 ) {
00416         f = tsum*norm/tcount;
00417         df = tcount*tsum2/(tsum*tsum)-1;
00418         if( df > 0 ) df = 100*sqrt(df/(tcount-1)); else df = 100;
00419     } else df = 100;
00420     sprintf(buf,"%lld %lld %d %lg %lg %lg %lg %lg %ld ",ntot,nleft,njob,tsum,
00421             tsum2,tcount,f,df,start_time);
00422     return true;
00423 }
00424 
00425 bool EGS_JCFControl::getCombinedResult(double &f, double &df) const {
00426     if( tsum > 0 && tsum2 > 0 && norm > 0 && tcount > 1 ) {
00427         f = tsum*norm/tcount;
00428         df = tcount*tsum2/(tsum*tsum)-1;
00429         if( df > 0 ) df = 100*sqrt(df/(tcount-1)); else df = 100;
00430         return true;
00431     }
00432     df = 100; f = 0; return false;
00433 }
00434 
00435 bool EGS_JCFControl::readControlString() {
00436     /*
00437     MY_ISTREAM data(buf);
00438     if( !egsGetI64(data,ntot) ) return false;
00439     if( !egsGetI64(data,nleft) ) return false;
00440     double f,df;
00441     data >> njob >> tsum >> tsum2 >> tcount >> f >> df >> start_time;
00442     return data.good();
00443     */
00444     double f,df;
00445     int res = sscanf(buf,"%lld %lld %d %lg %lg %lg %lg %lg %ld",
00446             &ntot,&nleft,&njob,&tsum,&tsum2,&tcount,&f,&df,&start_time);
00447     if( res == EOF || res != 9 ) return false;
00448     return true;
00449 }
00450 
00451 int EGS_JCFControl::startSimulation() {
00452     int res = EGS_RunControl::startSimulation();
00453     if( res ) return res;
00454     bool ok = (ipar == 1) ? createControlFile() : openControlFile();
00455     if( ok ) {
00456         egsInformation("    Parallel run with %d jobs and %d chunks per "
00457                 "job\n\n\n",npar,nchunk);
00458         return 0;
00459     }
00460     return -99;
00461 }
00462 
00463 bool EGS_JCFControl::readControlFile() {
00464     if( !p->rewindControlFile() ) {
00465         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to rewind the job control file\n");
00466         return false;
00467     }
00468     int res = READ_FILE(p->fd,buf,nbuf-1);
00469     if( res <= 0 ) {
00470         p->unlockControlFile();
00471         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to read the job control file\n");
00472         return false;
00473     }
00474     buf[res] = 0;
00475     if( !readControlString() ) {
00476         p->unlockControlFile();
00477         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to read from the control string"
00478               " <%s>\n",buf); return false;
00479     }
00480     return true;
00481 }
00482 
00483 bool EGS_JCFControl::writeControlFile() {
00484     if( !writeControlString() ) {
00485         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl::writeControlFile: failed to write to the "
00486                 "control string\n"); return false;
00487     }
00488     if( !p->rewindControlFile() ) {
00489         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl: failed to rewind the job control file\n");
00490         return false;
00491     }
00492     int nwant = strlen(buf)+1;
00493     int nwrite = WRITE_FILE(p->fd,buf,nwant);
00494     if( !p->unlockControlFile() ) {
00495         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl::writeControlFile: failed to unlock the "
00496                 "control file\n"); return false;
00497     }
00498     if( nwrite != nwant ) {
00499         egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl::getNextChunk: could write only %d "
00500              "instead of %d chars to the job control file?\n",nwrite,nwant);
00501         return false;
00502     }
00503     return true;
00504 }
00505 
00506 EGS_I64 EGS_JCFControl::getNextChunk() {
00507     if( !readControlFile() ) return -1;
00508     if( first_time ) { first_time = false; njob++; }
00509     double sum, sum2, count;
00510     app->getCurrentResult(sum,sum2,norm,count);
00511     tsum += sum - last_sum; tsum2 += sum2 - last_sum2;
00512     tcount += count - last_count;
00513     last_sum = sum; last_sum2 = sum2; last_count = count;
00514     EGS_I64 nrun = ncase/(npar*nchunk);
00515     if( nrun < 1 ) nrun = 1;
00516     if( nrun > nleft ) nrun = nleft;
00517     if( nrun > 0 ) app->setSimulationChunk(ntot,nrun);
00518     nleft -= nrun; ntot += nrun;
00519     writeControlFile();
00520     double f,df;
00521     if( accu > 0 && getCombinedResult(f,df) ) {
00522         if( df < 100 && df < accu ) {
00523             char c = '%';
00524             egsWarning("\n\n*** After combining the results of all parallel "
00525               "jobs the requested\n    uncertainty of %g%c was reached: %g%c\n"
00526               "    => terminating simulation.\n\n",accu,c,df,c);
00527             return 0;
00528         }
00529     }
00530     return nrun;
00531 }
00532 
00533 int EGS_RunControl::finishSimulation() {
00534     cpu_time = timer.time();
00535     egsInformation("\n\nFinished simulation\n\n");
00536     egsInformation("%-40s%.2f (sec.) %.4f(hours)\n",
00537             "Total cpu time for this run:",cpu_time,cpu_time/3600);
00538     //egsInformation("Total cpu time for this run: %g seconds (%g hours)\n\n",
00539     //        cpu_time, cpu_time/3600);
00540     if( previous_cpu_time > 0 )
00541         egsInformation("%-40s%.2f (sec.) %.4f(hours)\n",
00542             "CPU time including previous runs:",cpu_time+previous_cpu_time,
00543             (cpu_time+previous_cpu_time)/3600);
00544     egsInformation("%-40s%-14g\n","Histories per hour:",3600.*ndone/
00545             (cpu_time+previous_cpu_time));
00546     egsInformation("%-40s%-14lld\n","Number of random numbers used:",
00547             app->randomNumbersUsed());
00548     double ch_steps, all_steps; app->getElectronSteps(ch_steps,all_steps);
00549     egsInformation("%-40s%-14g\n","Number of electron CH steps:",
00550             ch_steps);
00551     //egsInformation("%-40s%14g\n","Number of all electron steps:",
00552     //        all_steps);
00553     egsInformation("%-40s","Number of all electron steps:");
00554     egsInformation("%-14g\n",all_steps);
00555     return 0;
00556 }
00557 
00558 int EGS_JCFControl::finishSimulation() {
00559     int err = EGS_RunControl::finishSimulation();
00560     if( err < 0 ) return err;
00561     if( removed_jcf ) return 0;
00562     if( !readControlFile() ) return -2;
00563     njob--;
00564     writeControlFile(); p->closeControlFile();
00565     if( njob > 0 || removed_jcf ) return 0;
00566     string cfile = egsJoinPath(app->getAppDir(),app->getFinalOutputFile());
00567     cfile += ".lock";
00568 #ifdef WIN32
00569     int res = _unlink(cfile.c_str());
00570 #else
00571     int res = unlink(cfile.c_str());
00572 #endif
00573     if( res ) egsWarning("EGS_JCFControl::finishSimulation: failed to remove "
00574            " the job control file %s\n",cfile.c_str());
00575     removed_jcf = true;
00576     return 1;
00577 }
00578 
00579 EGS_JCFControl::~EGS_JCFControl() { delete p; }
00580 
00581 bool EGS_JCFControl::closeControlFile() { return p->closeControlFile(); }
00582 
00583 bool EGS_JCFControl::lockControlFile() { return p->lockControlFile(); }
00584 
00585 bool EGS_JCFControl::unlockControlFile() { return p->unlockControlFile(); }
00586 
00587 bool EGS_JCFControl::rewindControlFile() { return p->rewindControlFile(); }
00588 
00589 typedef EGS_RunControl* (*EGS_RunControlCreationFunction)(EGS_Application *);
00590 
00591 EGS_RunControl* EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(EGS_Application *a) {
00592     if( !a ) {
00593         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(): "
00594                 "null application?\n"); return 0;
00595     }
00596     EGS_Input *inp = a->getInput(); EGS_Input *irc = 0;
00597     if( inp ) irc = inp->getInputItem("run control");
00598     if( !irc ) {
00599         /*
00600         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(): "
00601                 "the application does not have any input\n");
00602         return 0;
00603         */
00604         if( a->getNparallel() > 0 ) return new EGS_JCFControl(a);
00605         else return new EGS_RunControl(a);
00606     }
00607     /*
00608     EGS_Input *irc = inp->getInputItem("run control");
00609     if( !irc ) {
00610         egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject(): "
00611                 "the application input has no 'run control' item\n");
00612         return 0;
00613     }
00614     */
00615     string libname; int err = irc->getInput("library",libname);
00616     EGS_RunControl *result;
00617     if( !err ) {
00618         EGS_Library *lib = 0;
00619         for(unsigned int j=0; j<rc_libs.size(); j++) {
00620             if( libname == rc_libs[j]->libraryName() ) {
00621                 lib = rc_libs[j]; break;
00622             }
00623         }
00624         if( !lib ) {
00625             string dsodir = egsJoinPath("egs++","dso");
00626             dsodir = egsJoinPath(dsodir,CONFIG_NAME);
00627             dsodir = egsJoinPath(a->getHenHouse(),dsodir);
00628             lib = new EGS_Library(libname.c_str(),dsodir.c_str());
00629             lib->load();
00630             if( !lib->isLoaded() ) {
00631                 egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject: failed to"
00632                     " load the library %s from %s\n",libname.c_str(),
00633                     dsodir.c_str()); delete irc; return 0;
00634             }
00635             rc_libs.push_back(lib);
00636         }
00637         EGS_RunControlCreationFunction create =
00638             (EGS_RunControlCreationFunction) lib->resolve("createRunControl");
00639         if( !create ) {
00640             egsWarning("EGS_RunControl::getRunControlObject: failed to"
00641                    " resolve the run control creation function of library %s\n",
00642                    libname.c_str()); result = 0;
00643         }
00644         else result = create(a);
00645     }
00646     else {
00647         if( a->getNparallel() > 0 ) result = new EGS_JCFControl(a);
00648         else result = new EGS_RunControl(a);
00649     }
00650     delete irc; return result;
00651 }
